content: crochet pattern for these charming flower scrunchies these make great gifts can be sold at markets and can be worn anywhere these cute hair pieces make the perfect accessory for cottagecore and fairycore lovers or just any girl who loves pretty things you should already know how to crochet the stitches listed below before buying this pattern this was tested by my amazing team size about 4 5 inches across including a 2 inch gap for the elastic difficulty easy a beginner should be able to do this if they learn the basic stitches first stitches us chain sl single_crochet double_crochet automatic download for pdf document this top quality pattern is 4 pages 2 if you print double sided and guides you along with plenty of pictures and tips the yarn i used worsted weight 4 ply gauge 17 single_crochet stitches by 18 row makes a 4x4 inch square because this isn t a fitted item you don t need to stress too much about gauge as long as your stitches are tight enough that there are no large gaps suggested yarn this is what i used but don t be afraid to do your own version yardage about 12 yards or 25 ounces i used red heart super saver which is a worsted weight 4ply acryllic yarn you can make a two color flower or a single color one you can do any color you d like i enjoyed using brown yellow or green for the centers and i ve used pink yellow red white and purple for the petals if you re struggling to decide on a color take a look at the cover photo for some inspiration you will also need yarn needle stitch markers i just use a short yarn hair elastics - you can use any size really but i used a 2 inch medium hair tie hook sizes g 4 mm looking for free giveaways coupons and more fun come join our club https //www facebook com/groups/210475173897335 if you have any questions or need help please contact me i love to help you may of course sell your final product but please use your own pictures
